name: weatherbit_io-fetch-current-weather
description: Fetch current weather from a location. [See docs here](https://www.weatherbit.io/api/weather-current)

latitude.description: The latitude of the location to fetch the current weather for

longitude.description: The longitude of the location to fetch the current weather for

name: weatherbit_io-fetch-daily-forecast-weather
description: Fetch daily forecast weather from a location. [See docs here](https://www.weatherbit.io/api/weather-forecast-16-day)

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which to fetch the daily forecast.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which to fetch the daily forecast.

days.description: The number of days for which to fetch the daily forecast (up to 16).

name: weatherbit_io-fetch-historical-weather-data
description: Fetch historical wheater data from a location. [See docs here](https://www.weatherbit.io/api/weather-history-daily)

latitude.description: The latitude of the location for which to fetch historical weather data.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location for which to fetch historical weather data.

startDate.description: The start date of the date range for which to fetch historical weather data (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

endDate.description: The end date of the date range for which to fetch historical weather data (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
